title: THDCIL overcame many challenges to become 4351 MW entity: CMD R K Vishnoi
description: THDC India Ltd (THDCIL) has achieved significant milestones in the energy sector over the last 36 years, with a portfolio of nine projects (hydro, thermal, wind, and solar) and a total capacity of 4351 MW. The company's CMD, R K Vishnoi, highlighted the company's success and growth, citing employees' dedication and perseverance.
